description.value:
The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus [[/damage 1d6 type=fire average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=fire average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander canâ€™t make tail attacks against other targets.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Heated Body. A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage 2d6 type=fire average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Heated Weapons. Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra [[/damage 1d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a hit (included in the attack).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
